name: Bulbasaur
description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.
evolution_info: bulbasaur evolves into ivysaur via level 16. ivysaur evolves into venusaur via level 32
search_content: Name: Bulbasaur. Types: grass, poison. Stats: HP 45, Attack 49. Description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON. Evolution: bulbasaur evolves into ivysaur via level 16. ivysaur evolves into venusaur via level 32

name: Ivysaur
description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.
evolution_info: bulbasaur evolves into ivysaur via level 16. ivysaur evolves into venusaur via level 32

name: Venusaur
description: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
